definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Electroplating process in holes is a new technique for precise diamond reamer manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 內鍍工藝是一種新的精密金剛石鉸刀的製造方法。

sentences.english: The precision of reamer depends on the precision of die.
sentences.chinese: 鉸刀的精度是以胎具的製造精度爲基礎。

sentences.english: When reaming iron links, the reamer should not be askew.
sentences.chinese: 鉸削鐵鏈時鉸刀不能歪斜。

sentences.english: Use the reaming blade on the end of the tube cutter to remove any burrs
sentences.chinese: 用截管器尾部的鉸刀清除毛邊。

sentences.english: A combined reamer has been modified by the author, consquently the working efficiency and repairing quality are improved.
sentences.chinese: 將鉸刀改進成組合式，便提高了工作效率和加工質量。

sentences.english: This paper explains the method of reasonably use and regrinding of reamer.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了合理使用與重磨鉸刀的方法。

sentences.english: A guide pin is inserted and the femoral head and neck are reamed with an adjustable reamer.
sentences.chinese: 插入導針，股骨頭頸用可調節鉸刀擴髓。

sentences.english: Pass me that reamer for making spirals.
sentences.chinese: 把螺旋鉸刀給我拿過來。
